Articles.Content:
The Oceanic Industries 1 Ridgeback is the first in the series of SSTO Fighters developed to defend OI Installations around the Kerbin System. It is powered by a SABRE Engine and holds 510 Units of Liquid Fuel, 440 Units of Oxydizer, along with 110 Units of Mono propellant. While not exactly a long range fighter, it has to Mini-Docking Ports on the edge of each wing to hold Munitions, and a Standard Docking Port at the front of the Airframe to allow it to dock with Carriers, or Refueling Stations.

Keybindings are as follows

1=Toggle Mode on SABRE Engine

2=Shutdown Engine

3=Open Docking Port

https://www.dropbox.com/s/xmfysqkpdfz88w5/OI-1%20Ridgeback%20Production%20Model.craft

OI-1 Ridgeback Prototype in the background, with the OI-1 Ridgeback tail number 19 in the front.

Thoughts on the Craft & any tips on making it more stable would be appreciated.
